indicator_name: Hlutfall stöðugilda (eftir kyni, aldri, fötluðum einstaklingum og þjóðfélagshópum) hjá opinberum stofnunum (innlendir og staðbundnir löggjafar, opinber þjónusta og dómskerfi) borið saman við skiptingu í samfélaginu.
target: Teknar verði ákvarðanir á öllum sviðum þar sem brugðist er við aðstæðum og víðtæk þátttaka tryggð.
graph_title: Hlutfall stöðugilda (eftir kyni, aldri, fötluðum einstaklingum og þjóðfélagshópum) hjá opinberum stofnunum (innlendir og staðbundnir löggjafar, opinber þjónusta og dómskerfi) borið saman við skiptingu í samfélaginu.

en.goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 4.0 MB)
en.indicator_definition: In order that decision-making be responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative, it is important to ensure diversity in representation at all levels of State institutions (central, regional and local).
en.indicator_name: Proportions of positions (by sex, age, persons with disabilities and population groups) in public institutions (national and local legislatures, public service, and judiciary) compared to national distributions
en.target: Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels
en.graph_title: Proportions of positions (by sex, age, persons with disabilities and population groups) in public institutions (national and local legislatures, public service, and judiciary) compared to national distributions
